mapper.select:
select C_BOARD_ID as "communityBoardId", C_CATEGORY_ID as "communityCategoryId", C_EMAIL as "communityEmail", C_PASSWORD as "communityPassword", C_TITLE as "communityTitle", C_WRITE_DATE as "communityWriteDate", C_READ_COUNT as "communityReadCount", U_ID as "usersId", C_CONTENT as "communityContent"
from community
mapper.insert: insert into community ( C_BOARD_ID, C_CATEGORY_ID , C_EMAIL, C_PASSWORD , C_TITLE , C_WRITE_DATE , C_READ_COUNT, U_ID, C_CONTENT ) values (#{communityBoardId}, #{communityCategoryId}, #{communityEmail}, #{communityPassword}, #{communityTitle}, sysdate, 0, #{usersId}, ${communityContent} )
